titleStmt.title: An exposition with notes vpon the first Epistle to the Thessalonians. By William Sclater D.D. and Minister of the Word of God at Pitmister in Sommerset
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition vpon the first Epistle to the Thessalonians.
A variant (STC 21834a) has Henrie Fetherstone named as publisher in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
